ComicInfo.Title: My Sword I Lay Down!
ComicInfo.Summary: My Sword I Lay Down!: Spider-Man and Moon Knight get mixed up in the internal struggles of Chinatown when the White Dragon and his gang try to take power from the ruling Tiger's Claw. Peter's old college chum, Philip Chang, finds himself at the center of the conflict and a direct target of White Dragon but refuses to fight as he has taken a pacific vow.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:44:46. [Issue ID 39003]
